name: Van
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: I know it has been a tough day for you
text1: As time goes by, everything will be better!
textInChatBox: Just in case you feel you don't have anything!! remember you have my love! Love is the best thing in the world, and the thing that lives the longest...
text2: That's what I was going to give you my love.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: I love you! Loved you yesterday, love you still, always have, always will.
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you love me too.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
